p: Thank you for submitting your article "Sequential perturbations to mouse corticogenesis following in utero maternal immune activation" for consideration by eLife. Your article has been reviewed by three peer reviewers, including Anita Bhattacharyya as the Reviewing Editor and Reviewer #1, and the evaluation has been overseen by Kathryn Cheah as the Senior Editor. The following individual involved in review of your submission has agreed to reveal their identity: Hanna Stevens (Reviewer #2).
